xml.episodeInfo:
FUTURAMA
Episode 510
THE FARNSWORTH PARABOX
Bill Odenkirk Dave, The Neutral Planet
xml.info: Opening Credits. Caption: Beats A Hard Kick In The Face.
Outside Planet Express. The top of the tower explodes in a huge fireball and electricity zaps around the rest of the building.
Cut to: Planet Express: Meeting Room. Bender is sat at the table snoring as the room shakes and bits of ceiling fall on him.
Cut to: Planet Express: Lounge. Fry and Leela sit on the couch. Plaster is still falling from the ceiling and the building is still shaking.
xml.speak: (SHOUTING) I know you've rejected me a lot before but frankly I wasn't sure we were right for each other either, but now I am! So how 'bout a date tonight?
(shouting): Sorry I think I, um, I think I left my toaster on.
(SHOUTING) C'mon Leela, what's the real reason you won't go out with me?
(SHOUTING) Look, I'm embarrassed to admit this but you forced me to. I can't go out tonight because ......I have sweaty boot rash!
xml.info: On the other side of the room Amy looks up from the table.
xml.speak: No spluh! Why do you think I'm sitting over here in the stink-free zone?
xml.info: Fry laughs.
xml.speak: So, will you go out with me?
xml.info: Planet Express: Meeting Room. The crew are sat around the table. Farnsworth is covered in dirty stains and tries to rub them off with a cloth.
xml.speak: Good news everyone, I'm still technically alive! Yes! But I need to you to dispose of this crazy ass experiment that almost killed me. You'll have to throw it into the sun itself, for only the thermonuclear inferno of the sun has enough energy to ensure its total destruction!
I can hit it with a shovel!
That's not good enough.
This one time I pounded a guy into the ground like a stake with a shovel!
Yes yes!
xml.info: Zoidberg lifts the lid slightly.
xml.speak: So what's in the box already?
No peeking! I don't know what's in there but I'm sure our minds would be unable to comprehend -
xml.info: Hermes lifts the lid and Farnsworth hits his hand with the hammer.
xml.speak: Ow! You hurt my collater!
I don't care. Listen well: No matter what happens, no matter how great your curiosity, you are forbidden to look in this box. Forbidden! Pretty tantilising though!
xml.info: Planet Express: Farnsworth's Lab. The box is on a stool and Bender, Zoidberg, Fry, Leela and Hermes stand around it.
xml.speak: Whatever's in there it's the only thing I've ever wanted.
In my experience boxes are usually empty. Or maybe with a little cheese stuck to the top. And one time pepperoni! What a day that was! (shouting) Give me the box!
xml.info: Hermes fires a laser into the air.
xml.speak: Scram you lousy green snakes! Here Leela, take this and use it to shoot those guys.
xml.info: He hands her the laser.
xml.speak: Right! If they try to look in the box.
Whatever.
xml.info: Planet Express: Meeting Room. Fry sits at the table while Bender paces around restlessly.
xml.speak: Let's just forget about the box. The Professor said to stay away.
Fry, how can you be so naive? He was joking. Get it?
No.
That's what makes it so funny! OK he wasn't joking now shut up and follow me.
xml.info: Planet Express: Basement. Bender removes the hatch from a superheated steam pipe and climbs in. Fry follows.
xml.speak: FROM VENT Ow it's hot! The butter in my pocket is melting!
xml.info: Cut to: Planet Express: Farnsworth's Lab. Above the room Bender removes the grate.
Cut to: Vent. Bender takes out his eyes and replaces them with bendy periscope type eyes.

Cut to: Planet Express: Farnsworth's Lab. Bender's eye emerge from the vent and he scans the room. Leela is asleep in the corner. Bender chuckles. He extends his arms down the box, picks it up and brings it back into the vent. Fry groans from the heat.
Planet Express: Basement. Bender puts the box on a crate in the middle of the room
xml.speak: We thank you Bender for the gift we are about to receive!
xml.info: He lifts the lid and he and Fry gasp. Fry pulls something out.
xml.speak: Tangled up Christmas lights! We can take shifts untangling them!
Unlabled booze! Widemouth too!
xml.info: He downs the bottle and Fry starts on the lights.
Cut to: Planet Express: Farnsworth's Lab.
xml.speak: That oughta keep those dopes occupied. I can guard the real box in peace now that no one's curious about it.
xml.info: She walks across the room and places the box back on the stool and picks up a magazine called Nosy Enquirer. She hums as she reads it. She looks up at the box but goes back to the magazine and hums louder.
Time Lapse. The next morning Leela is still in the lab guarding the box. A clock rings 7am.
xml.speak: Well, I got through the night and no one looked in the box. Not even me. The person who gave up her whole evening to watch it. A whole evening of TV gone. What a mockery of justice it is that I can't take even a little tiny peek! I need coffee. OK. Heads I look, tails I don't. Oh yeah! Heads! I mean - alright then! No. I have a duty not to look. But then again, I promised the coin I would. Oh it's deep. Deeper than a small box should be.
xml.info: She is sucked inside the box and screams.

Cut to: Universe 1: Farnsworth's Lab. Everything goes all wobbly and the box changes colour from yellow to light blue. Leela is ejected from it. She lands face first onto the floor. She is unaware that she has fallen into a parallel universe inside the box.
xml.speak: Ouch! My lawyer will hear about this!
xml.info: Enter Fry. But his hair is black and his jacket is green.
xml.speak: Leela, what have you done?
Nothing. What do you mean "why was I looking in the box?"
I mean your hair. It's all different-y.
xml.info: Enter Bender. But he is gold.
xml.speak: Bender? Is that you?
You know it! Large and in charge!
xml.info: Enter Farnsworth with a scar around his head.
xml.speak: Leela? Oh, there's a woman for you! Always dying her hair instead of not looking in a box.
I didn't dye my hair. This is how I always look.
No, that's how you always look. This throws my entire perception of reality into question. Clone? Robot? Or long lost twin? Taking all bets! I also offer video poker!
xml.info: Time Lapse.
xml.speak: It's some guy wearing a Leela costume! Get him!
xml.info: Leela whips out Hermes' laser and points it at them.
xml.speak: Hold it! You have this all wrong. I just fell into the box and then I fell out somehow.
You shut up sir.
No wait, I've got it! I know what's in the box. Oh I've been as dumb as Fry!
Am not!
It contains a parallel universe! And when you create a parallel universe it's almost always populated by evil twins!
No look, I am not evil. My loan officer said so.
Oh you'd like us to believe that wouldn't you Leela? Or should I say Eveela?
Oh this is awful. Somewhere there's a Bender more evil than me. I do my best dammit!
Leela? The good Leela. I want you to snoop around the other universe and find out how evil they are. Here.
I tell you they're not evil. But don't be confused. They are jerks.
xml.info: Leela 1 dives into the box.
She punches him.
Enter Leela 1 via the box. She points the laser back into it.
xml.speak: Come out of your universe with your hands up!
xml.info: Enter Fry, Bender, Amy, Zoidberg and Farnsworth. They put up their hands.
xml.speak: Oh wow. It's like that drug trip I saw in that movie when I was on that drug trip.
Astonishing. I must have created a parallel universe!
Baldercrap! I created your universe! All you created was my fist parallel to your face!
xml.info: He weakly punches him.
xml.speak: Ow.
Look. It doesn't matter who created what. The important thing is - yah!
xml.info: She kicks the laser out of Leela 1's hand. Leela 1 leans back to Farnsworth 1.
xml.speak: (WHISPERING) We're exactly the same. I know all her moves. Therefore, I've got the upper hand.
xml.info: Both Leelas fly at each other, collide and land in a heap on the floor.
xml.speak: Now now, perfectly symmetrical violence never solved anything.
xml.info: Universe 1: Meeting Room. Both crews sit around the table.
xml.speak: Let's recap what's happened so far. As you can see I accidentally created a box containing your universe.
While I, in a simultaineous blunder created a box containing your universe.
This is getting confusing. Why don't we call our universe "Universe A" and this universe "Universe B"?
Hey, why can't we be universe A?
Yeah!
Yeah!
We want the best letter!
We called it first. Besides, this place kinda feels like a "B" y'know?
Alright, you can be crummy universe A. And we'll be universe 1!
Or "The Mongooses," that's a cool team name. The Fighting Mongooses!
Wait a minute. If our universes are identical then why did our Leela look into the box and your Leela didn't?
Well to be honest I tossed a coin. It came up tails so I didn't look.
That's weird. Mine came up heads so I did.
Interesting. Apparently the key difference between our universes is that coin flips have opposite outcomes.
That explains fruity here! I tossed a coin to pick my finish. Foghat grey!
Hey! Bite my glorious golden ass!
Your people and your slight differences disgust me. I'm going home. Where's that blue box with our universe in it?
Oh you'd like to get back to your evil universe wouldn't you? And destroy your box with our universe inside it.
Nonsense! I would never do such a thing unless you would already have been going to do that!
Wha?
You heard me!
In any case, I've hidden the box and it will remain hidden unitil I'm convinced you're not evil! Everyone, keep an eye on your evil counterpart.
xml.info: Farnsworth turns to the A crew.
xml.speak: And you all do the same!
Um, can Fry and I watch our parallel selves together? We have plans tonight.
You guys are dating?
Oh no no no. We're married.
xml.info: Leela 1 puts her arms around him. They kiss. Fry and Leela's jaws drop.
Universe 1 Street. Bender A and Bender 1 walk down the street while all the time watching each other.
xml.speak: I've got my eye on you boy!
Don't even think about it lunch-pail! You'd be dead before you hit the ground!
Good point. Whatyya say we just hit a strip joint?
I was waitin' for one of us to say that! Bender A, you're a prince among robots! Can you forgive me for distrusting you?
xml.info: They hug.
xml.speak: Aw, I can't stay mad at what is essentially me. I love me!
xml.info: They take each others wallets and chuckle.
Universe 1: Lounge. The two Amy's paint their toenails.
xml.speak: This is so great! I always wanted an imaginary friend!
I'm not imaginary, I'm parallel! We're exactly the same, right down to the - Splech! Is that pink nail polish?
xml.info: Amy 1 points at Amy's yellow toenails.
xml.speak: Is that not pink nail polish? The Professor's right, you are evil! And shallow!
I am not evil!
xml.info: Universe 1 Elzar's. The Frys and Leelas sit at a table.
xml.speak: So Fry, Leela, how'd you two get together?
Funny story. I asked Leela out a million times and she just kept rejecting me.
I'd make up things like "I have sweaty boot-rash" or "I have to meet the President"!
xml.info: She laughs. Fry glares at Leela.
xml.speak: Oh man, you never heard such excuses! But, like a dope, I believed her. Looking back on it now it's kinda funny!
(SARCASTIC) It sure is, right Leela? Funny. Ha ha ha ha!
Then one night when Fry asked me out the only excuse I could think of involved ghosts. I knew he wouldn't buy it so I did what I always do in those situations.
Oh Lord!
I flipped a coin. It came up heads and we went out.
xml.info: Fry turns to Leela.
xml.speak: You mean you flipped the coin too? And it was tails? So that's why you said you had to meet that ghost.
You really missed out on something Leela. That date was magical.
One year later I gave Leela a diamond scrunchy, and we were married.
xml.info: Leela 1 turns around and shows Leela the scrunchy.
xml.speak: Woo!
One year later I got beat up at a Neil Diamond concert by a guy named Scrunchy!
xml.info: Universe 1 Farnsworth's Lab. The two Farnsworth's fiddle around with the chandelier controls and the lights brighten and dim.
xml.speak: Well that was pointless.
Say, I hope you won't think it "evil" of me to ask how you got that stylish head wound!
Oh this old thing? I was experimenting to see if I could remove my own brain!
Of course! I had the same idea! I flipped a coin to decide if I should proceed but it came up tails - so I didn't. How'd it go?
Well getting the brain out was the easy part. The hard part was getting the brain out!
xml.info: He laughs insanely. Farnsworth chuckles.
xml.speak: Oh you!
xml.info: Universe 1 Alley. The two Zoidbergs sit in a dumpster.
xml.speak: So, tell me about yourself!
Well don't look into it but I'm a respected internal medicine doctor! Ooo a can!
xml.info: He picks up the can and slurps the contents of it.
xml.speak: As for me I design mansions, then live in them. (crying) I'm lying! I'm an appalling failure!
xml.info: Zoidberg cries too.
xml.speak: (CRYING) Me too! A big fat one.
And those co-workers. Always looking down on us Zoidbergs. What are they? From Nob Hill?
They're all like "Stop spraying me with ink Zoidberg!" "Put on pants Zoidberg!" "Don't touch our fancy box Zoidberg!"
Oh that box! Too good for us is it?
Bah! Someday they'll watch! From down in the gutter they will, as King Zoidberg caresses their fancy box.
You know, maybe a certain blue lobster saw where Professor hid the box!
xml.info: Zoidberg laughs evily and Zoidberg 1 joins in.
Universe 1 Meeting Room.
xml.speak: Good news everyones!
After carefully reading the scriptures, we've concluded that none of us are evil!
Yes, the Bible is the real good news! Anyhow, you're all free to go back to your own universe.
xml.info: Enter Hermes 1.
xml.speak: What's goin' on here? Why aren't you all out destroying the Professor's box?
Hermes, aren't you confused about the fact thats there's two of everybody?
No. Now like my granny used to say back in her tall paper shack on Montego Bay "If you want a box hurled into the sun, you got to do it yourself!"
Your granny can go to hell! I've hidden the box so that no one can destroy the home universe of my handsome friend here!
Oh go on! Wait a second. If your Hermes was about to destroy the box containing our universe...
Then your Hermes...
Oh my!
xml.info: Cut to: Planet Express: Hangar. The hangar doors open and Hermes walks up the steps into the ship.
xml.speak: Like granny said "If you want a box hurled into the sun, you got to do it yourself!" God rest her zombie bones.
xml.info: Universe 1: Farnsworth's Lab.
xml.speak: So we go through the box and stop Hermes?
Right. Good thing Professor B there hid it in the sealed clam tank. No one but a crazy lobster would look there!
xml.info: In the tank Farnsworth 1 opens a giant shell. There is nothing inside.
xml.speak: It's gone!
xml.info: Cut to: Universe 1 Alley. Zoidberg 1 is sat on a bin holding the box and wearing a Slurm cup on his head. Zoidberg A bows to him.
xml.speak: All hail Zoidberg! The king with the box! Now it's my turn maybe?
The box says no.
xml.info: Ship's Cockpit.
Universe 1 Farnsworth's Lab.
xml.speak: (CRYING) If I know parallel Hermes, he's at the sun by now.
Our universe is doomed!
Dooooomed!
Now don't give up yet you cry babies. The box is gone but we still have one preposterously slim hope.
Is it a kind of hairspray?
No. We must attempt to create another box containing our universe! Doy!
xml.info: Time Lapse. Farnsworth pulls the switch on the multi-purpose nose making machine and the lights dim. Several boxes come out of it on a conveyor belt. The two Farnsworths scream madly while everyone else remains calm.
Time Lapse. Several boxes are on the floor. Fry picks one up and pokes his head inside it.
xml.speak: Well? Is that your universe in there?
FROM BOX Nope. Too cold.
xml.info: He pulls his head out. It is frozen in a block of ice. Farnsworth puts his head in one.
Leela runs by with her head in a box and tentacles emerging from it.
xml.speak: Oh man it's hopeless! We'll never find your universe in time! Plus, this box is stuck on my fat head.
Yes it's the apocalypse alright. I always thought I'd have a hand in it!
I'm not sad. Because I finally found someone as great as me! It's like I always say: "Make new friends and keep the old. One is silver..."
"...and the other's gold!"
xml.info: They hug and cry. Enter Zoidbergs with the right box.
xml.speak: Why with the long faces?
xml.info: Leela 1 gasps.
xml.speak: The idiots have the box!
I think she means you.
Grab them!
xml.info: They surround the two Zoidbergs and back them against the shelves containing the other universes. The shelves wobble and Universe #25 falls off and lands on Zoidberg, taking him and Universe A with it.
He picks up the box and drops it over his head. He runs around with his legs sticking out and woops. He runs into the shelves and all the other boxes fall off.
xml.speak: Splug! Which one did they go into?
We'll have to search a universe. Everyone, grab a length of wire first so you can find your way back.
xml.info: They each grab a wire anchored to his lab table and jump into a parabox.
Universe 25. The Zoidbergs come in via a box and leave via another box. Amy 1 follows and looks around.
xml.speak: Hello? Did you see two smelly lobsters?
We didn't see anything.......ever!
xml.info: Universe 1729. Enter Fry.
xml.speak: Yo, did two shellfish in scrubs go by?
xml.info: The people in this universe have giant wobbly heads.
xml.speak: Hell no.
Shut up!
Beat it jerk!
xml.info: Universe 31. Enter Leela. This universe is populated by blocky robot versions of the crew.
xml.speak: Uh, have you robot versions of yourselves seen any extra Zoidbergs around here?
Uh, access denied.
xml.info: Fry 31's head explodes.
Universe XVII. The Professor's lab resembles an ancient Greek study and Farnsworth XVII is hard at work writing something on a blackboard. Enter the Bender's behind him.
xml.speak: Hey man look what I snagged from the leprachaun universe!
xml.info: He opens his chest cabinet and pulls out a crock o' gold.
xml.speak: Yeah leprachaun universe is fine...if you haven't seen pirate universe!
xml.info: He pulls out a treasure chest. Bender 1 gasps.
xml.speak: Faith and begota!
xml.info: They leave. Farnsworth XVII turns around from the blackoard.
xml.speak: Quae?
xml.info: Universe 420. Enter the Zoidbergs.
xml.speak: Quick, into another box!
There aren't any in this universe there aren't. Hey you, what with the no boxes?
xml.info: This universe is populated by hippies.
xml.speak: Baby they're somewhere, everything's like somewhere! Place is kinda au natural right now.
xml.info: Enter Farnsworth A and Farnsworth 1.
xml.speak: There they are!
xml.info: The Zoidbergs scream. Farnsworth takes the parabox to Universe A away from them.
xml.speak: Gotcha!
Dig it! All of you living in this boxed is like seriously freaked up!
Nonsense, why there's a whole universe in there.
Dude, there's a universe in all of us.
xml.info: Amy 420 puts her arms around him.
xml.speak: Right on Professor Freaksworth!
xml.info: Farnsworth 420 offers Farnsworth a flower.
xml.speak: Get a job! (shouting into the parabox) We've got the box. Everyone pull your wires.
xml.info: They pull them and they are reeled in.
Universe 1: Farnsworth's Lab. Everyone flies in and hits their heads on the lab table.
xml.speak: Hurry! Back to Universe A!
xml.info: The A's and 1's jump into the box.

Ships Ejection Port. The ship has arrived at the sun and Hermes prepares to eject the box. He pushes it through the slot into the airlock and his finger hovers over the eject button. The A's and 1's jump out of the box. They are trapped in the airlock. Farnsworth pounds on the glass.
xml.speak: Hermes don't press that button!
xml.info: Hermes thinks about it for a while.
xml.speak: OK.
xml.info: Planet Express: Meeting Room. The crew all say goodbye to their parallel selves.
xml.speak: So long your majesty!
xml.info: Zoidberg 1 climbs into the box. Fry 1 and Leela 1 kiss and climb in.
xml.speak: There but for the flip of a coin go we. So uh Leela, seeing how the universe wasn't destroyed, you wanna catch an ape fight? Y'know? Together?
Well, I guess you deserve one more flip.
xml.info: She flips the coin.
xml.speak: So? Heads or tails?
xml.info: Leela looks at the coin.
xml.speak: Y'know, lets just say it's heads.
xml.info: Fry smiles. Farnsworth reaches into the parabox and Farnsworth 1's hand comes out.
xml.speak: Ready?
xml.info: The paraboxes fold into each other. Farnsworth now holds the blue box.
xml.speak: There. That space-time inversion has given us their box and vice-versa!
So what you think you just explain to us is that -
Correct! This box contains our own universe!
xml.info: Everyone gasps.
xml.speak: Sweet honey bee of infinity!
xml.info: Bender takes the box from Farnsworth and shakes it. The building shakes.
xml.speak: Bender, quit destroying the universe!
xml.info: She snatches the box away and the room shakes again.
xml.speak: But...aw!
Yes, all that is and ever shall be is in that box! And the box itself is probably worth something too. We must cherish it, as we cherish every moment of our lives.
xml.info: Planet Express: Lounge. Zoidberg, Bender and Leela are sat on the couch. Bender changes the channel. Enter Fry with a beer. He sees there is no space left on the couch so he sits on the parabox. The universe goes all squishy.
THE END
